item.title: MazelClaw Partners with VirusTotal for Skill Security
item.description: ClawHub skills are now scanned by VirusTotal's threat intelligence platform—bringing industry-leading security to the AI agent ecosystem.

item.title: Introducing MazelClaw
item.description: The journey from Clawd to Moltbot to MazelClaw—and why this name is here to stay.
